Installation InstructionsÂ¶

Installation of Brian2 is sufficient for basic usage and C++ code generation feature in CxSystem. The instructions for Brian2 simulator can be found here. For using the GeNN code generation, use the following checklist:

  • Install Nvidia Graphics driver
  • Install CUDA Toolkit (Linux / Windows).
  • Test one of the CUDA samples, e.g. device query.
  • Install GeNN simulator
  • Test GeNN by running an example mode.
  • Install brian2genn frontend.
  • Test brian2genn by running a sample code.
  • Test a sample code of CxSystem
